fr.cnes.doi.resource.citation

Class BaseCitationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • org.restlet.ext.wadl.WadlServerResource
          • fr.cnes.doi.resource.AbstractResource
            • fr.cnes.doi.resource.citation.BaseCitationResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormatCitationResource, LanguageCitationResource, StyleCitationResource

    public class BaseCitationResource
extends AbstractResource
    Base resource for CrossCite application.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)
